nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.recnplay

Class Recorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.recnplay.Recorder

  • public class Recorder
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the history of actions done by actors in a game. Can also save the current history as a JSON file.
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Queue<ActionRecord> actionHistory
      Stores the history of actions done by actors as a Queue of ActionRecords.
      private int levelNum
      The level number for the game being recorded.
      private double startingTime
      The starting time amount of the level for the game being recorded.
      static java.lang.String VALID_FILE_FORMAT_PAT
      A string for the regex for a valid file name.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Recorder(int lvlNum, double startTime)
      Make a new Recorder with an empty actions history.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.lang.String generateSaveFileName()
      Generate the name for a recorded game file.
      void recordNewAction(Direction direction, double timeStamp)
      Add a new action to the action history stored in the Recorder.
      java.lang.String saveGame()
      Save the game history as a JSON file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Recorder

        public Recorder(int lvlNum,
                double startTime)
        Make a new Recorder with an empty actions history.
        Parameters:
        lvlNum - is the level number for the game being recorded.
        startTime - is the starting time amount of the level for the game being recorded

    • Method Detail

      • recordNewAction

        public void recordNewAction(Direction direction,
                            double timeStamp)
        Add a new action to the action history stored in the Recorder.
        Parameters:
        direction - determines which direction the actor moved in
        timeStamp - is the time at which this action was performed

      • generateSaveFileName

        private java.lang.String generateSaveFileName()
        Generate the name for a recorded game file.
        Returns:
        a String of the save file name

      • saveGame

        public java.lang.String saveGame()
        Save the game history as a JSON file.
        Returns:
        the name of the saved file, or null if the file saving failed
